If you want a simple solution that integrates end-to-end encryption into your commercial webmail, then use Virtru. It has a browser plugin that integrates straight into your webmails. Viewers are redirected to a secure webpage to view  and reply to your emails and do not need your public key in advance, and do not have to download anything.

If you are looking to use a more secure webmail service overall, I would suggest protonmail.
